properties.name: webstarter.mvc.locale-change-http-methods
properties.description: The HTTP method(s) over which the locale can be changed.

properties.name: webstarter.mvc.locale-change-ignore-invalid
properties.description: Whether to ignore an invalid value for the locale parameter.

properties.name: webstarter.mvc.locale-change-param-name
properties.description: The name of the parameter that contains a locale specification in a locale change request.

properties.name: webstarter.security.login-url
properties.description: The URL to send users to if login is required.

properties.name: webstarter.security.login-success-url
properties.description: Specifies where users will go after authenticating successfully if they have not visited a secured page prior to authenticating.

properties.name: webstarter.security.login-failure-url
properties.description: The URL to send users if authentication fails.

properties.name: webstarter.security.logout-url
properties.description: The URL that triggers log out to occur.

properties.name: webstarter.security.logout-success-url
properties.description: The URL to redirect to after logout has occurred.

properties.name: webstarter.security.timeout-url
properties.description: The URL to redirect to send users if session timeout.

properties.name: webstarter.security.ignored
properties.description: Comma-separated list of paths to exclude from the default secured paths.
